For reference

table schema


Question.ID (integer)
Question.Question (text)
Question.Option_1 (text)
Question.Option_2 (text)
Question.Option_3 (text)
Question.Option_4 (text)
Question.Answer (text)
Question.QuizID (integer)
Question.CreatedDate (timestamp with time zone)
Question.Q_no (integer)
Question.Quizname (text)


create question table query

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Question"
(
    "ID" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 9 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "Question" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Option_1" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Option_2" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Option_3" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Option_4" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Answer" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "QuizID" integer,
    "CreatedDate" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    "Q_no" integer,
    "Quizname" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "Quiz_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT fk_question_quiz FOREIGN KEY ("QuizID")
        REFERENCES public."Quiz" ("ID") MATCH SIMPLE
        ON UPDATE NO ACTION
        ON DELETE NO ACTION
)



Quiz.ID (integer)
Quiz.QuizName (text)
Quiz.CreatedDate (time without time zone)
Quiz.NoOfQns (integer)

create Quiz table query

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Quiz"
(
    "ID" integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 6 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "QuizName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "CreatedDate" time without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    "NoOfQns" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Quiz_pkey1" PRIMARY KEY ("ID")
)


User.ID (integer)
User.Name (text)
User.Organisation (text)
User.Email (text)
User.Password (text)
User.CreatedDate (timestamp without time zone)
User.id (integer)

create User table query

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."User"
(
    "ID" integer NOT NULL,
    "Name" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Organisation" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Email" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Password" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "CreatedDate" timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    id integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Usertable_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("ID")
)

Userscore.ID (integer)
Userscore.QuizID (integer)
Userscore.Score (integer)
Userscore.UserID (integer)
Userscore.CreatedDate (timestamp without time zone)
Userscore.Quizname (text)

create Userscore table query

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Userscore"
(
    "ID" integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "QuizID" integer,
    "Score" integer DEFAULT 0,
    "UserID" integer,
    "CreatedDate" timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    "Quizname" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "Userscore_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("ID")
)

quiz.q_no (integer)
quiz.question (text)
quiz.option_1 (text)
quiz.option_2 (text)
quiz.option_3 (text)
quiz.option_4 (text)
quiz.answer (text)

create quiz table query

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.quiz
(
    q_no integer NOT NULL,
    question text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    option_1 text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    option_2 text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    option_3 text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    option_4 text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    answer text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT quiz_pkey PRIMARY KEY (q_no)
)
